reviews.text: my agency was fooled into thinking this is a pretty good business hotel. And, I have already reported it. Nobody could speak proper English at the reception, I asked for directions to the Rendevouz Hotel..I get told 3 times..'sure we can do your laundry'..oh well. I look for a bath to soak in, nothing. Ask reception where it is..and find out there is a shower right above the toilet. So, you end up removing towels or anything you dont want to get soaked. Great! And if you are a person with long legs, try sitting on the toilet sideways. helps not to squeeze your legs against the wall. Bed bugs! Galore! I am still scratching. If you smoke, you might need a mask, no ventilation, cant open the window. Three good things, you have a phone, a TV, and an air-conditioner. Space..hahahahaha! Quietness, nothing, kids running up and down the room above you or your corridor, and my most pet peeve..the breakfast service! Get cold toast and no butter..get coffee 10 minutes later..20 minutes, screaming for breakfast only to be told..oh sorry..we are busy! Thanks..but guess what? Me very hungry and want HOT food! So, bring me HOT everything RIGHT NOW!!! So, if you choose this hotel..good luck to you! (scratch scratch)
reviews.title: Do not opt for this even if this is the last resort given by your agent

reviews.text: we booked 2 superior rooms through agoda .one for us and one for our friend,both at the same rate.we got room 805,after entering our room we discovered the room was not much bigger than the bed and the bathroom was not much better. we went down and complained and and were told if we wanted a bigger room it was going to cost an extra 32.10 a night extra. we agreed to pay the extra. a few days later we went to visit our friends room as she went to malaysia for a visit and had left us her room key . upon entering her room 706 we were shocked to find it totally different to what we were originally allocated. much larger bigger bathroom and it had a tv which i am not sure we had in our first room. we complained to the front desk and have tried to get a refund of 160.50 singapore through agoda without any luck. my point is this if we booked 2 superior rooms paid the same for each of them ,then surely as a customer we should have the same quality ( size) i would still like to get a refund as i am not happy. but i do not no what to do next.the staff behind the counter are very nice and i get the impression they have had this problem before

Can't sleep at the Selegie
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Fragrance Selegie on the 12th & 13th of April 2006. The hotel was easy distance to Orchard Road which is the main shopping drag. The staff were always courteous, helpful and keen. The American set breakfast was toast, eggs, sausage, hash browns and a small amount of salad plus beverages. The dining area was well presented and clean and we didn't have to wait for a table. Hotel security seemed adequate and doors had card locks.
